meanings.definition: A form of entertainment that tells a story through moving images on a screen.
meanings.sent1: We watched a lot of movies during the weekend.
meanings.sent2: Going to the movies is a fun way to spend time with friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed fascinated by the movies playing on the TV.
meanings.sent4: Her life felt like a series of movies, each with its own plot twists.
meanings.sent5: The movies transported her to different worlds and adventures.

meanings.sent1: The new movies in the theater are getting great reviews.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy watching classic movies from the golden age of cinema.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel accidentally photobombed the movies we were filming in the park.
meanings.sent4: His memories played like old movies in his mind, flickering and fading.
meanings.sent5: The movies on the big screen felt larger than life, drawing the audience in.
